lagrange.impl.movement

Class Advection_RK4_3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • lagrange.impl.movement.Advection_RK4_3D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Advection, Movement

    public class Advection_RK4_3D
extends java.lang.Object
implements Advection, Movement, java.lang.Cloneable
    3D Movement implementation using a Cash-Karp Runge-Kutte solver to perform integration across horizontal velocity fields. Cash-Karp Runge-Kutte solver: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cash%E2%80%93Karp_method

      • setH

        public void setH(float h)
        Sets the time step duration - i.e. the interval over which the integration occurs.
        Parameters:
        h - - duration in milliseconds, stored as seconds, since the time units must correspond with the velocity files.
